description: The everyday hoodie flannel stand-by for campfire hangs, beach wanders, and strolls on neighborhood trails. It's 100% lightweight cotton, brushed for that had-it-forever look and softness. The lightest flannel in our line, it's easily worn indoors and out, which means there's every reason to keep a handful in your regular wardrobe rotation.
name: Mountain Hardwear Dusk Creek LS Hooded Shirt - Mens

specs.value: Flannel Glass House Plaid - 100% Cotton - 200 g
